message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $11000. This is my final compromise.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $10500.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go that high, but I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'll offer it to you for $10800. This is my final compromise.
